originalText.text: A huge shoutout to Creative Circle for helping me land an great job with a company I value. They were not just friendly but downright awesome. They listened to me, understood my needs, and with their magic touch, they led me to a full-time role that feels like it was tailor-made for me. Not only does it fit my expectations, it also aligns perfectly with my needs for a great culture-fit, and addresses all my continued career aspirations. As an experienced developer, finding the ideal role and location to further my career has been a challenge. I can't thank Creative Circle enough for their support, and I'll be coming back to them for future opportunities as the need arise. They've earned a special place in my career journey, and I couldn't be happier with the results!

originalText.text: Recently passed my 1-year anniversary working for Creative Circle with Jayce as my recruiter and ongoing contact (and yep, he's as awesome as other reviewers are saying). The whole experience has been great! In the beginning, they did a great job of coming up with potential places where I could work, ultimately landing me my dream gig working at an airline. The assignment is still going, and it looks like I can stay with it indefinitely. I really feel like I'm thriving. Definitely recommend working with them – especially if you get a chance to work with Jayce. :)

originalText.text: If you're a creative person, sign up with Creative Circle! I have been working with them for over 10 years- they are honestly the best agency, have gotten me the best work, the most aligned jobs for my skills, and they sincerely have your back, they love to cheer you on, and place you in the best gig. Thank you Creative Circle for being so awesome- it is not always easy to find jobs as a creative person, but with your help- it has been amazing!

originalText.text: This is an overdue review - I've worked with this recruiter with a few clients and it was a horrible experience. Creative Circle will sell you, devalue your talents for the lowest rate and take the lions share for themselves. The client I was placed with at the time, was willing to increase my rate and Creative Circle lied about how it wasn't possible to get an increase. I worked for another client under CC and the manager I reported to, told me I would need to "get use to being demoralized in order to stay at that company and get ahead", I reported this to the CC and they mis-managed the entire relationship and myself. I decided to not work for them any longer and I believe I've been put on a do not hire internal list. I share this experience because as freelancers are seeking jobs in this economy and I would advise, that we raise our standards higher and work with partners and recruiters who have our best interest, value our worth and respect us. Don't give them your talents. It's the equivalent of selling your soul for people who don't care.

originalText.text: Working with Pamela Koenig over at Creative Circle has been a Fantastic experience! Creative Circle and staff really make you feel taken care of, Pamela literally got me hired on a Sunday, to start working the following week! Outstanding!
